name: Genesis in my neighborhood
description:
This is my first NFT. My works are developed from a single clip. In this particular case, I left my camera working on capturing these frames for a period of 3 hours during the afternoon. Once finished, I do the color grading In Da Vinci Resolve.
This is the first step, where I already get the raw material to polish. I work with this raw material in Adobe Premiere, using different masks that, in sync with the sounds, generate a visual impact with a marked aesthetic code. In this process, I let myself be carried away by the sensations and the play that the montage produces.
